text: @Mike_Pence @realDonaldTrump @WhiteHouse Translation: The President and the entire Coronavirus Task force are stopping at nothing to support the narcissistic need of our leader and will continue to work every day to gaslight the nation with propaganda sessions held directly from the WH briefing room! #TrumpMeltdown
